structure.unit: ARTICLE III. DADE COUNTY VESSEL MOORING CODE

law.catch_line: Nesting or rafting of vessels prohibited in certain circumstances.

text.section:
Sec. 7-35. Nesting or rafting of vessels prohibited in certain circumstances.
The installation of pilings or the nesting or rafting of vessels in such manner as encroaches on the navigable channel of the river as defined by the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, or creates a hazard to river navigation, shall be unlawful.
